Melati Wijsen founded Bye Bye Plastic Bags (@byebyeplasticbags) with younger sister Isabel when they were just 10 and 12 years old. Their fight against plastic pollution paid off last June when plastic bags, straws and Styrofoam were banned in Bali, where they live. â€œIndonesia is the worldâ€™s largest archipelago with only ocean separating our 17,000 islands,â€ says Melati, now 18. â€œAnd yet we are the worldâ€™s second-largest source of marine plastic pollution. Plastic is everywhere.â€ â£â£
